sense.name: provide or take in substance for heat or power
sense.examples: We fuelled the car and started driving. Our heating system is fuelled by gas. The tanker fueled in Bahrain Oil fuels furnace.

sense.name: support or stimulate an idea, activity or emotion
sense.examples: The rapid promotion of the director's son has itself fuelled resentment. The underlying issue that fuels this debate is not one of conscience or economy. That fuelled the speculation that fish drops from heaven.
